    • Constructor Detail

      • R2D2

        public R2D2(int hitpoints,
            edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.userInterface.MessageRenderer m,
            starwars.SWWorld world)
        Create a R2D2. They will move in a specific patrol path which is 5 times east and 5 times west.
        Parameters:
        hitpoints - the number of hit points of this Droid. If this decreases to below zero, the Droid will become immobile.
        m - MessageRenderer to display messages.
        world - the SWWorld world to which this Droid belongs to

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        R2D2 will move in a specific path and heal droid on its way. It can heal droid which are immobile using its internal reservoir. It can dissassemble droids who are immobile. It can repair droids who are immobile if it is carrying an droid part. It will also heal itself if it has less health using oil from its reservoir.
        Overrides:
        act in class starwars.Droids
